metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9863 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in phpMyAdmin. With a very large request to table partitioning function, it is possible to invoke a Denial of Service (DoS) attack. All 4.6.x versions (prior to 4.6.5) are affected.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9863` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.5.4.1-2ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.5.4.1-2ubuntu2').
